title: I have the maestro error....AGAIN!!!!!! PLEASE HELP !!!
body: I have the meastro error where everytime i connect to the client it gives me the message: "League of legends has lost contact with Maestro.League of legends will now exit.Please restart the client." I've repaired the client  I configured the dns, I did the firewall troubleshooting, I did the packet buffering thing, I did the release/renew ip flush dns and NONE OF THEM WORK! And the rest of the troubleshooting I either can't do or didn't need to do. Riot please help quickly.

replies.body: I appreciate the troubleshooting you've tried so far, and I see you also reviewed the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in another thread you replied to.  I still recommend going through each step, not just the ones that seem most convenient.    Try using our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to help you out!  It will automatically configure some of your settings, including firewall access.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EOzsio4I,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-11T18:33:08.775+0000)
>
> I appreciate the troubleshooting you've tried so far, and I see you also reviewed the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in another thread you replied to.  I still recommend going through each step, not just the ones that seem most convenient.    Try using our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to help you out!  It will automatically configure some of your settings, including firewall access.

The thing is I for the rest of the troubleshooting issues I can't do them like the wired connection or port forwarding and either way I didn't need those last time. This only started happening today!!!

Thanks for trying!  Go ahead and reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will take a look.  You can also send us an email via support@riotgames.com as another method of sending a ticket.

>
> I appreciate the troubleshooting you've tried so far, and I see you also reviewed the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in another thread you replied to.  I still recommend going through each step, not just the ones that seem most convenient. It will automatically configure some of your settings, including firewall access.

AND EVERY TIME I TRY TO SEND A TICKET IT SAYS WOOPS ERROR
